alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Washington; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 11:42PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Orange, southern Caledonia, southern Addison, Rutland, Windsor and southern Washington Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1142 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shoreham to near West Castleton to near Hartford to 6 miles southeast of Fort Edward. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Barre, Rutland, Woodstock, Middlebury, Braintree Hill, Bradford, Killington, Salisbury, Rutland City, Websterville, Orwell, Rutland - Southern Vermont Airport, Pomfret, Hartland, Ira, Fairlee, Mount Holly, Sharon, Washington, and Shoreham. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 1 and 50. Interstate 91 between mile markers 55 and 71, near mile marker 73, between mile markers 75 and 91, between mile markers 94 and 116, near mile marker 118, near mile marker 120, and between mile markers 123 and 125. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Washington; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
